text: Conrad Brooks (born Conrad Biedrzycki; January 3, 1931 - December 6, 2017) was an American actor. Biography at the internet movie database He played in Ed Wood's Plan 9 from Outer Space. He was born in Baltimore, Maryland. Brooks died of complications from sepsis on December 6, 2017 at his home in Martinsburg, West Virginia, at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *The Official Conrad Brooks Website Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Deaths from sepsis Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths
title: Conrad Brooks
